{{Wired embedded system |brand=Check Point |model=UTM-1 Edge |revision=N (SBXN-200-3) |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |type=security appliance |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Cavium |cpu1_model=CN5010 |cpu1_cspeed=300 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=ESMT |fla1_model=F59L2G81A -25TG |fla2=2 |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX29LV160DBTI-70G |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM68C16CWQE-25H |ram1_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 14-pin header,, unpopulated,, JP5 |serial=yes,, console port,, RJ45 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1512 |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6171R |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=2 |addl_chips=2-Wire RTC IC;Seiko;S35390A;;1;,,, RS-232 Transciever;Intersil;ICL3243E;;1;,,, Hardware Monitoring IC;Novoton;NCT7802Y;;1;,,, 30V P-Channel MOSFET;Fairchild;FDS9435A;;1;,,, 2.5V 600mA Low Dropout Linear Regulator;AME;AME8809DEHA;;1;,,, 3A 23V 340kHz Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Richtek;RT8290;;1;,,, 3A Synchronous Step-Down Switcher w/ Integrated FET;Texas Instruments;TPS54327;;1;,,, 4.5/16V Synchronous Step-Down Dual Buck Switcher and USB Switch;Texas Instruments;TPS65252;;1; |flags=RTC w/ battery, metal case, heatsink |oui_eth=00:08:DA }} {{TagLine|Check Point UTM-1 Edge N}} :[https://www.cpug.org/forums/showthread.php/6341-UTM-1-Edges-FAQ User Group FAQ]
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Cavium]]'' CN5010 [[MIPS64]] (@300MHz) *Memory: 256MB (SDRAM) DDR2 *Storage: 2MB NOE Flash, 256MB NAND Flash *Network: 6x Gigabit Ethernet
==Images== <gallery> File:Check Point UTM-1 Edge N Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Check Point UTM-1 Edge N Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
